property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The object's container.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: stationery
property.shortdesc: Is the file a stationery file?

property.name: fullName
property.shortdesc: The file associated with the document.

property.name: activeLayer
property.shortdesc: The active layer.

property.name: activeView
property.shortdesc: The document's current view.

property.name: geometricBounds
property.shortdesc: The bounds of the illustration excluding stroke width.

property.name: visibleBounds
property.shortdesc: The visible bounds of the illustration including stroke width.

property.name: selection
property.shortdesc: The selection within the document.

property.name: documentColorSpace
property.shortdesc: The color space used for the document.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The document's name.

property.name: path
property.shortdesc: Path specification for the document.

property.name: saved
property.shortdesc: Has the document been saved?

property.name: defaultFilled
property.shortdesc: Should a new path be filled?

property.name: defaultFillColor
property.shortdesc: Default fill color.

property.name: defaultFillOverprint
property.shortdesc: Will art beneath a filled object be overprinted by default?

property.name: defaultStroked
property.shortdesc: Should a new path be stroked?

property.name: defaultStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: Default stroke color.

property.name: defaultStrokeOverprint
property.shortdesc: Will art beneath a stroked object be overprinted by default?

property.name: defaultStrokeWidth
property.shortdesc: Default width of stroke.

property.name: defaultStrokeDashes
property.shortdesc: Default dash lengths (set to {} for a solid line)

property.name: defaultStrokeDashOffset
property.shortdesc: The default distance into the dash pattern at which the pattern should be started.

property.name: defaultStrokeCap
property.shortdesc: Default type of line capping.

property.name: defaultStrokeJoin
property.shortdesc: Default type of joints.

property.name: defaultStrokeMiterLimit
property.shortdesc: Specifies whether a join is mitered (pointed) or beveled (squared-off) by default.

property.name: activeDataSet
property.shortdesc: The active data set.

property.name: variablesLocked
property.shortdesc: The locked variables.

property.name: XMPString
property.shortdesc: The XMP packet string associated with the document.

property.name: rasterEffectSettings
property.shortdesc: The document raster effects settings.

property.name: artboards
property.shortdesc: All artboards in the document.

property.name: compoundPathItems
property.shortdesc: The compound path artwork in this collection.

property.name: layers
property.shortdesc: The layers in this document.

property.name: pageItems
property.shortdesc: All the artwork in this document.

property.name: pathItems
property.shortdesc: The path artwork in this document.

property.name: tags
property.shortdesc: The tags in this document.

property.name: views
property.shortdesc: The views in this document.

property.name: rasterItems
property.shortdesc: The raster art items in this document.

property.name: placedItems
property.shortdesc: The placed art items in this document.

property.name: meshItems
property.shortdesc: The mesh art items in this document.

property.name: pluginItems
property.shortdesc: The plugin art items in this document.

property.name: graphItems
property.shortdesc: The graph art items in this document.

property.name: nonNativeItems
property.shortdesc: The non-native art items in this document.

property.name: groupItems
property.shortdesc: The group items in this document.

property.name: textFrames
property.shortdesc: The text frame items in this document.

property.name: stories
property.shortdesc: The story items in this document.

property.name: characterStyles
property.shortdesc: The list of character styles in this document.

property.name: paragraphStyles
property.shortdesc: The list of paragraph styles in this document.

property.name: kinsokuSet
property.shortdesc: The Kinsoku set.

property.name: mojikumiSet
property.shortdesc: The Mojikumi set.

property.name: swatches
property.shortdesc: The swatches in this document.

property.name: swatchGroups
property.shortdesc: The Swatch Groups in this document.

property.name: gradients
property.shortdesc: The gradients available in this document.

property.name: patterns
property.shortdesc: The patterns available in this document.

property.name: spots
property.shortdesc: The custom spot colors available in this document.

property.name: symbols
property.shortdesc: The symbols defined in this document.

property.name: symbolItems
property.shortdesc: The symbol items in this document.

property.name: brushes
property.shortdesc: The brushes defined in this document.

property.name: graphicStyles
property.shortdesc: The graphic styles defined in this document.

property.name: variables
property.shortdesc: The variables defined in this document.

property.name: inkList
property.shortdesc: The list of inks in this document.

property.name: dataSets
property.shortdesc: The data sets defined in this document.

property.name: legacyTextItems
property.shortdesc: The text frame items in this story.

method.name: close
method.shortdesc: Close the specified document(s)

parameters.name: saving
parameters.shortdesc: Specifies whether changes should be saved before closing.

method.name: save
method.shortdesc: Save the document.

method.name: saveAs
method.shortdesc: Save the document with specific save options.

parameters.name: saveIn
parameters.shortdesc: The file to save the document in.

parameters.name: options
parameters.shortdesc: Options for the file type specified.

method.name: print
method.shortdesc: Print the document.

method.name: exportFile
method.shortdesc: Export the specified document(s)

parameters.name: exportFile
parameters.shortdesc: The file to export the document to.

parameters.name: exportFormat
parameters.shortdesc: The file type to export the document as.

parameters.name: options
parameters.shortdesc: Options for the file type specified.

method.name: activate
method.shortdesc: Activate the first window associated with the document.

method.name: importVariables
method.shortdesc: Import a library containing datasets, variables and their associated dynamic data. Importing variables will overwrite existing variables and datasets.

method.name: exportVariables
method.shortdesc: Save datasets into an XML library. The datasets contain variables and their associated dynamic data.

method.name: importCharacterStyles
method.shortdesc: Load the character styles from the Illustrator file.

method.name: importParagraphStyles
method.shortdesc: Load the paragraph styles from the Illustrator file.

method.name: importPrintPreset
method.shortdesc: Apply the named print preset from the file to the current print setting.

parameters.name: printPreset
parameters.shortdesc: The name of a print preset to import.

method.name: exportPrintPreset
method.shortdesc: Export the current print setting to the preset file.

method.name: importPDFPreset
method.shortdesc: Load all PDF presets from a file.

parameters.name: replacingPreset
parameters.shortdesc: Should existing editable presets be replaced?

method.name: exportPDFPreset
method.shortdesc: Save all PDF presets to a file.

method.name: importPerspectiveGridPreset
method.shortdesc: Loads mentioned perspective grid preset, if preset name is specified, else loads all(if no preset name is specified) presets, from the specified file.

method.name: exportPerspectiveGridPreset
method.shortdesc: Saves all perspective grid presets to a file.

method.name: imageCapture
method.shortdesc: Capture the artwork content inside the clip bound as raster image, and write out the captured image data into the target image file.

parameters.name: imageFile
parameters.shortdesc: The file to which the captured image should be written.

parameters.name: clipBounds
parameters.shortdesc: The rectangular region of the artwork for image capture. If the parameter is omitted, the entire artwork bound is captured.

method.name: windowCapture
method.shortdesc: Capture the current document window to the target TIFF image file.

parameters.name: imageFile
parameters.shortdesc: The TIFF file to which the captured image should be written.

parameters.name: windowSize
parameters.shortdesc: The size to make the window before capture.

method.name: rasterize
method.shortdesc: Rasterize the source art(s) within the specified clip bounds. The source art(s) are disposed as a result of the rasterization.

parameters.name: sourceArt
parameters.shortdesc: The page item(s) to be rasterized.

parameters.name: clipBounds
parameters.shortdesc: The rectangular region of the artwork for the rasterization. If the parameter is omitted, the bounds of the source art(s) is used instead.

method.name: rearrangeArtboards
method.shortdesc: Rearrange Artboards in the document.

parameters.name: artboardRowsOrCols
parameters.shortdesc: Number of rows (for rows layout) OR column(for column layouts)of artboards.Range is 1 to (docNumArtboards - 1) or 1 for single row or column layouts.

parameters.name: artboardMoveArtwork
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to move artwork with artboards.

method.name: selectObjectsOnActiveArtboard
method.shortdesc: Select art objects in active artboard.

method.name: fitArtboardToSelectedArt
method.shortdesc: Change the artboard to selected art bounds.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the artboard to update.

method.name: convertCoordinate
method.shortdesc: Converts the coordinate system of a single point from one coordinate system to another.

method.name: selectPerspectivePreset
method.shortdesc: Selects a predefined preset to define grid for the current document.

method.name: showPerspectiveGrid
method.shortdesc: Shows the current active perspective grid for the document, if no active perspective grid then shows the default perspective grid for the document.

method.name: hidePerspectiveGrid
method.shortdesc: Hides the current active perspective grid for the document, if there is visible perspective grid.

method.name: getPerspectiveActivePlane
method.shortdesc: Gets the active plane of the active perspective grid of the document.

method.name: setPerspectiveActivePlane
method.shortdesc: Sets the active perspective plane for the active grid of the document.
